docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Aug. 6.--There is a rapidly-spreading opinion among business men that the present business and financial crisis and the government's apparent inability to halt the decline of exchange proves the failure of Uruguay's experiment with the...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Aug. 6.--There is a rapidly-spreading opinion among business men that the present business and financial crisis and the government's apparent inability to halt the decline of exchange proves the failure of Uruguay's experiment with the commission form of government, as the administrative machinery is proving too cumbersome to move rapidly in a crisis such as the present.
docs.abstract: Commission form of govt thought to be unsuccessful

headline.main: URUGUAY RESTIVE UNDER BOARD RULE; Business Men Begin to Feel Government by Commission Is Too Cumbersome. ASSAIL DELAYS IN CRISIS Nine Members Are Said to Avoid Drastic Action, Although Needed, Because of Fear of Unpopularity.

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: Bond prices were irregularly lower yesterday in dull trading on the New Yorh Stock Exchange. Strength in  the German Government issues resuited in a moderate rally in the European list generally, but the LatinAmerican issues were sharply lower.
